verses.roman:
bandhu-bāndhava-sthāne svapna kahila
śuniyā sakala loka vismita ha-ila

synonyms: bandhu-bāndhava—of friends and relatives; sthāne—in the presence; svapna—dream; kahila—explained; śuniyā—after hearing; sakala—all; loka—the people; vismita—astonished; ha-ila—became.
translation: He related the dream to his friends and relatives, and every one of them was very much astonished to hear of it.
